alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 1:06AM AKST until December 21 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with localized amounts up to 9 inches, are expected. * WHERE...Summits along the Steese Highway and the surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southwest winds gusting to 35 mph this afternoon and tonight will produce low visibilities in blowing snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
